means: 感到刺痛，引起刺痛( prickle的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He paused, feeling his scalp prickling under his hat.
sentence.Network_cn: 他停了下来，觉得帽子下面头皮刺痒。

sentence.Network_en: I have a prickling pain in my left eye.
Sam could feel the hairs prickling at the back of his neck.
sentence.Network_cn: 山姆感到脖子后的头发有些扎.

pricklegrass 隐花草属, prickling 刺感, prickless 无刺的

list.abs: pricking 剌prickle cell 剌细胞primary 最初的
prickle 针prickle cell 棘细胞prickly 多刺的
Her eyes prickled with unshed tears ., 她眼睛刺痛 , 噙着泪水.
Branchlets with more dense , minute prickles . Leaf margin distinctly 3 –5 - lobed ; lobes acute ., 有更浓 , 微小的刺的小枝 . 清楚的叶缘 3-5 浅裂 ; 裂片锐尖.
...末二次羽轴粗3~4 mm，表面密被小皮刺(small prickle)。末次羽片披针形.

entry.tran: 有刺痛感；有强烈的感触
entry.def: If your skin prickles, it feels as if a lot of small sharp points are being stuck into it, either because of something touching it or because you feel a strong emotion.

example.ex: He paused, feeling his scalp prickling under his hat...
example.tran: 他停了下来，觉得帽子下面头皮刺痒。
她因为忧惧而浑身发毛。

entry.def: Prickles are small sharp points that stick out from leaves or from the stalks of plants.

example.ex: ...an erect stem covered at the base with a few prickles.
example.tran: 根部有几根刺的笔直的茎

means.word_mean: 1. a prickling somatic sensation as from many tiny pricks
1. causing or experiencing a painful shivering feeling as from many tiny pricks;

sentences.sentence: "the tingling feeling in a foot that has gone to sleep"

auth_sentence.content: Fans of the stuff are masonically loyal, prickling with a defensiveness and an ardor that not even Wagnerians can match.
auth_sentence.res_content: Fans of the stuff are masonically loyal, prickling with a defensiveness and an ardor that not even Wagnerians can match.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Fans of the stuff are masonically loyal, prickling with a defensiveness and an ardor that not even Wagnerians can match.

auth_sentence.content: I could hear the prickling fear behind his curiosity, the note of dread in his voice.
auth_sentence.res_content: I could hear the prickling fear behind his curiosity, the note of dread in his voice.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I could hear the prickling fear behind his curiosity, the note of dread in his voice.
